rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) has no respect for creatures without scales.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) pities creatures without armor, natural or made.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a hard time taking clothes seriously.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) considers dead bodies as food, no matter who they were while alive.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) loves making small knives and tools out of bones.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) longs for a life in the marshes.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) doesn't understand the concept of money.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has learned to laugh by observation. $(identity.pronouns.singular) still doesn't understand humor.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a preference for live food.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a hard time understanding and remembering names that aren't descriptive.
